adept.common

Class MentalStateMention.Filler

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.MentalStateMention.Filler
  • Enclosing class:
    MentalStateMention

    public static final class MentalStateMention.Filler
extends Object
    A filler for a role in a textual MentalState mention. Such role fillers may be of a limited number of different types, currently EntityMention, RelationMention and RelationMention.Filler. This class represents that uncertainty. The available types may expand in the future. This class is locally immutable.
